is there a way to convert kubuntu over t: but save everything i have installed

problem is, all the kubuntu stuff you have will be left installed. you can try "sudo apt-get autoremove kubuntu-desktop", but it may not work as you want -- in particular, pay attention to what it removes, it may remove stuff you wanted to keep
how long have you used it? KDE, in my opinion, looks terrible by default. once you make it suit your tastes more, though, it offers quite some power and an integrated environment
